findings.title: Owner cannot renounce and transfer ownership
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to renounce or transfer ownership.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot set max transaction limit
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to set a maximum transaction limit.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.
